overview.purpose: Document what khipus are demonstrably NOT
overview.methodology: Empirical testing of hypotheses and features
overview.guardrail: Pre-interpretive - no causal or historical claims

failed_hypotheses.test: Test if pendant values are concatenated (e.g., 12 + 34 = 1234)
failed_hypotheses.evidence: Only 0.3% of khipus show concatenation patterns
failed_hypotheses.interpretation: Khipus do NOT use concatenation-based arithmetic

failed_hypotheses.test: Test if pendant values multiply to primary
failed_hypotheses.evidence: Only 1.8% of khipus match multiplicative rule
failed_hypotheses.interpretation: Khipus do NOT use multiplication for summation

failed_hypotheses.evidence: Only 12 narrative khipus identified vs 600 accounting
failed_hypotheses.interpretation: Most khipus are NOT narrative/semantic - strongly numerical

failed_hypotheses.hypothesis: Random Design: Khipus are randomly structured
failed_hypotheses.test: Statistical distance from uniform random null model
failed_hypotheses.evidence: Real khipus >5σ from all random models
failed_hypotheses.interpretation: Khipus are NOT randomly designed - show intentional constraints

absent_features.interpretation: Khipus do NOT use color as alphabetic cipher

absent_features.evidence: Color sequences do not follow Zipf's law
absent_features.interpretation: Khipus do NOT encode natural language text

absent_features.evidence: Color usage shows some independence from numeric content
absent_features.interpretation: Colors do NOT have fixed semantic meanings
Khipus do NOT encode free-form narratives - highly templated

boundary_conditions.interpretation: Can confidently rule out random design
Can confidently rule out alphabetic encoding
Likely not linguistic, but cannot definitively rule out
Can rule out narrative for vast majority, but ~2% may be

boundary_conditions.claim: Khipus do NOT use concatenation arithmetic
boundary_conditions.interpretation: Can confidently rule out concatenation-based counting

impossible_configurations.interpretation: Deep hierarchies (>5 levels) are effectively forbidden
Khipus without variation are effectively forbidden
Minimal khipus (1 pendant) are uncommon but not impossible
